channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Peacock Promo Code and Coupons: 16% Off April 2025
item.description: Watch your favorite TV shows for less this April and save on a subscription with the latest Peacock coupons from WIRED.

item.title: OpenAI’s new image generator is now available to all users
item.description: OpenAI’s new image generator, powered by its GPT-4o model, is now available to all users, CEO Sam Altman said in a post on X. The feature was until no...

item.title: 20% Wayfair Coupon & Promo Codes | April 2025
item.description: Save with Wayfair promo codes and coupons for 10% off, up to 80% off furniture, and more on WIRED.

item.title: Samsung Promo Codes: $50 Off | April 2025
item.description: Save with the latest Samsung coupons, including 30% off phones, an extra $50 off your order, and $250 off trade-in offers on the latest tech.

item.title: Blue Apron Coupons: $80 Off + Free Shipping | April 2025

item.title: ChatGPT’s new image generator is really good at faking receipts
item.description: ChatGPT's new image generator is raising concerns for being really good at creating fake receipts.
